CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. MICHAEL WILLIAMS
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. PAUL D. CLEMENT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RICHARD J. DIAZ ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. PAUL D. CLEMENT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
